page.description: Get named range as crlf delimited lines of delimited text defaulting to comma separated if to separator specified.
page.prototype: GetNamedRangeText as C(namedrange as C[, separator as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.GetNamedRangeText("HISCORE") = 400
